column4: hi, I am currently getting issues in flash. there is no sound whatsoever and it always pauses and doesn't countinue and I don't hit pause either.
If someone could shed some light on this situation and help me out, that'll be much appreciated. =]
*adobe flash in firefox 3 beta 5
egeste sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree-extrasound
E: Couldn't find package flashplugin-nonfree-extrasound
egeste oh my bad sudo apt-get install libflashsupport
the package got renamed i forgot about it
thank you
that didn't fix anything. not the sound, and not the pausing thing.
hm that usually solves the issues, did u restart firefox, try killall pulseaudio && pulseaudio &
the pausing thing is because of the sound
do I do killall pulseaudio && pulseaudio & in terminal?
yea
what was that one pulsesound command again?
killall pulseaudio && pulseaudio &
Error opening PCM device hw:0: Device or resource busy
E: module.c: Failed to load  module "module-alsa-sink" (argument: "device_id=0 sink_name=alsa_output.pci_10de_3f0_sound_card_0_alsa_playback_0"): initialization failed.
hm last two errors are fine
they are supposed to be like that?
the first one is something to worry about, quit all applications that use sound
I have no applications open that use sound.
try to restart
